name: Variable
description: This variable will store your data so you can access it later.

name: Function
description: This function can do stuff for you; just buy it and call it.

name: Class
description: This class can hold your data and the functions that gather and preform operations on your data all in one place.

name: Dictionary
description: This dictionary can store your data in a nice organized way that makes it wasy to pick out specifically what you want later, without looping.

name: List
description: This list, or array, will store your data in a list that can be looped through or sorted.

name: For Loop
description: This loop will run once for each thing in the list of stuff.

name: If Statement
description: The if statement will run if the condition in the statement definition evaluates to true, or else it will run the statement in the else clause.

name: Elif Statement
description: This statement is a better and improved if statement that let's you make multiple checks in an easier way.

name: Try Clause
description: You can buy this clause and use it if you're not sure if your code will work.

name: While Loop
description: This loop will keep executing until the check is false.
